dcterms:description: GTAV is a dataset containing 24,966 images with a resolution of 1914x1052, designed for semantic segmentation tasks, sharing 19 classes with the Cityscapes dataset.
dcterms:title: GTAV

dcterms:creator: German Ros
Laura Sellart

dcterms:description: SYNTHIA is a large collection of synthetic images for semantic segmentation of urban scenes, containing 9,400 images with a resolution of 1280x760, sharing 16 classes with the Cityscapes dataset.
dcterms:title: SYNTHIA

dcterms:creator: Marius Cordts

Markus Enzweiler

Bernt Schiele
dcterms:description: Cityscapes is a dataset for semantic urban scene understanding, containing high-quality urban scene images with a resolution of 2048x1024, split into 2,975 training images and 500 images for validation.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes
